title: Where in this justify's me being perma banned? what did i do that was so bad i got perma banned?
body:
blitz bot says got 9 reports in the last 20 games (5%) of people ive played with reported me. if 5% of people get to decided my fate. then i would like 6% to undo that fate. 
so i can get harassed, and yet i get perma banned. this is bronze elo chat.

please give me a quote where i am deserving of a perma ban. 

all i get in game is rude comments and harassment. and yet this is cause for a perma ban.

larlzo: i have bad luck
larlzo: leashing
larlzo: speically against quinn

larlzo: that i helped you

larlzo: you know what sucks? a bad matchup that i start behind in cus i had to leash for vi

replies.body:
"YOU STUPID FUCK"
"yall can eat dicks"
"so fucking bad"
"or are you that idooitc"

TEEN
Content is generally suitable for ages 13 and up. May contain violence, suggestive themes, crude humor, minimal blood, simulated gambling and/or infrequent use of strong language.

i would hear this stuff in middle school hallways. 

so you say that calling peoplle stupid, bad and idoits. is grounds for permanent ban? 

and as for the eat dicks. dicks is a weird word as it can mean many things. a person, a thing, a place.

You were insulting your teammates in a game that you're supposed to be coordinating with them.

>so you say that calling peoplle stupid, bad and idoits. is grounds for permanent ban?

Your entire punishment history is taken into account before a permanent ban is issued. You were told after a 2-week ban that this would be the next step.
so you just agree that elementary insults are grounds for a permanent ban? riot needs to reform.
no little fella, YOU need to reform

no i dont, i did not say anything beyond the scope of 13 year old kids mind. 

elementary name calling is just that. basic

if i can be banned for something so basic, its not me that needs to reform.
so your saying i cant show my feeling in game? your saying i dont have a right to show my emotion in game?

haha really?

you are free to express your emotions all you want, 
"man I'm kicking some ass!"
"that was a poor teamfight by us"
"I can't fucking believe they stole that Baron"

all of these are expressing emotion without insulting and flaming others

if you can't "express yourself" without cursing at and belittling people, then you have a lot of growing up to do

i would take "that was a poor teamfight by us" as harassment your telling me i play bad.

the thing is anyone can take anything anyway. they can turn anything into a negative comment.

you can take it however you want, hell you can even report me for it

guess what? nothing will happen bc that sentence is in no way, shape, or form punishable

i think i'm done with you, if you want to make a new account and keep this childish mindset, be my guest.

out of 20 games 9 people reported me.

not counting me there are Max 180 other people i played with. 5%. i dont understand how 5% of people can have so much power over me. 

elementary insults.

Correct me if I'm wrong:

Your permaban was in August.

You had a 2-week ban that started on 8/7/2018.
how did u have access to this personal information anyway?

I looked at your match history and saw the 2-week long gap in your history.

You were consistently insulting or harassing a teammate. The first two games, it was the jungler, the 3rd and 4th game, it was the support. Usually you were zeroing in on one player, but you were consistently negative to many players in your game.

> [{quoted}](name=Periscope,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LAnwEzch,comment-id=0001000000020002000000010000,timestamp=2018-12-04T17:28:31.534+0000)
>
> I looked at your match history and saw the 2-week long gap in your history.

> You were consistently insulting or harassing a teammate. The first two games, it was the jungler, the 3rd and 4th game, it was the support. Usually you were zeroing in on one player, but you were consistently negative to many players in your game.


the first game if u even read i was asking for help and more help, but never received it all game. but yet they sure can harass me then report me afterwords then laugh at the fact that they won in the long game. 

he 2nd game i didnt even say anything out of line i was pointing out problems that we had. not even in a negitive way. 

the third game nautlis was trolling me as my supp, he was strait greifing me all of laneing phase. and im just supposed to let him do that to me? he didnt like the fact that i picked swain ADC so he trolled me, yet i get the consequences. 

the fourth game i just had a bad supp, and he was making stupid decisions and i was calling him out on it.  then he decides to leave me to 1v2 cus he decided that he didn't wanna play bot lane anymore. 

yet i bet nothing has happend to that nautilis. 

again if you look MOST OF THE TIME IM ASKING FOR HELP THEN NOT GETTING IT.

>the first game if u even read i was asking for help and more help, but never received it all game. but yet they sure can harass me then report me afterwords then laugh at the fact that they won in the long game.

You are blaming your jungler for you having fallen behind. A lot of your chat is specifically focusing on the leash and her not ganking your lane, both in the past tense. It's a consistent point that you were unwilling to put away and focus on the game. You also call for reports, and tell your team to give up. I removed any lines that were neutral. I didn't see any lines that were positive, aside from 1 about warding.

> None of this chat is acceptable in game. Chat is intended to build teamwork and work towards objectives. Your chat did neither of those things.

stating facts isnt acceptable ok. w/e man like i said earlier the fucked up thing is. why does it even have to come down to reports. why cant people be men.

do 1 thing wrong "report so and so inting"
say 1 thing "report so and so harrasment"
afk for 30 secs "report so and so afk"

there is no end it is a vicious cycle of reports. and i guess i will be joinging the FUCKING CIRCLE and i will be reporting anyone that even says 1 thing bad, afks more than 30 secs, and gets solo killed by his laner. getting a big fat report from me. thats what this game has come down too.

ill add pointing out you teammates mistakes is harassment.  anything else i should report on sight?

You can still use facts to insult others. For instance, calling attention to your score (1/12) would have been rude/reportable. 

>there is no end it is a vicious cycle of reports. 

Mute. That ends any sort of verbal harassment. If your jungler isn't going to gank, then you have to play around that. 

> i will be joinging the FUCKING CIRCLE and i will be reporting anyone that even says 1 thing bad, afks more than 30 secs, and gets solo killed by his laner. getting a big fat report from me. thats what this game has come down too.

I don't really find that reportable, but everyone has their own criteria, so have at it.
Freedom of speech is a right for all human beings. That's cool. Let me shout some racist shit for an hour in public and see the consequences of my actions.
the thing is, the freedom of speech says. u can say what you want as long as it does not effect another person's pursuit of happiness.

oh that doesn't actually apply in this setting.
 riot has the right to set their own rules on their own servers, and no where in the constitution says you're free from the consequences of  what you say. riot didnt actually stop you from saying what you wanted, they just warned you if you did say something objectionable, you run the risk of being punished/suspended
riot cant just say ill take this law from america but i wont use this law on our servers. no if they have US servers they must comply to the rules of the USA

> [{quoted}](name=larlzo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LAnwEzch,comment-id=000100000003000000000000,timestamp=2018-12-04T16:18:54.627+0000)
>
> riot cant just say ill take this law from america but i wont use this law on our servers. no if they have US servers they must comply to the rules of the USA

Its sad you have no idea how legal matters work...

to which they did follow it. they haven't violated any law. again, they didn't stop you from saying it, they just punished you for saying it. which is perfectly legal. (hence why shouting "FIRE!" in a crowded theater is still a misdemeanor if there isnt an actual emergency)

You do realize that "Freedom of Speech" in US law starts out by saying "***Congress*** shall make no law [...] abridging the freedom of speech" 

Riot Games is not Congress. Them punishing players for what they say is every bit as legal as your parents spanking you for something you said growing up.
Oh you had the freedom to say all of that, and you did.  BUT these are PRIVATE servers which means that RIOT can decide on what can or cannot be said.
